nodes.name: addTokenVesting

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows a vesting recipient to claim their vested tokens. Errors if no tokens have vested
 It is advised recipients check they are entitled to claim via `calculateVestingClaim` before calling this
nodes.name: claimVestedTokens

nodes.documentation:
@dev Calculate the vested and unclaimed period and tokens available for `_recepient` to claim
 Due to rounding errors once grant duration is reached, returns the entire left grant amount
nodes.name: calculateVestingClaim
addTokenVesting

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows a vesting recipient to claim their vested tokens. Errors if no tokens have vested
 It is advised recipients check they are entitled to claim via `calculateVestingClaim` before calling this
nodes.name: claimVestedTokens

nodes.documentation:
@dev Calculate the vested and unclaimed period and tokens available for `_recepient` to claim
 Due to rounding errors once grant duration is reached, returns the entire left grant amount
nodes.name: calculateVestingClaim

addTokenVesting(address[],uint64[],uint2.details: Add a new token vesting for user `_recipient`. Only one vesting per user is allowed The amount of PlotX tokens here need to be preapproved for transfer by this `Vesting` contract before this call

params._amount: Total number of tokens array in vested
params._recipient: Address array of the token recipient entitled to claim the vested funds
params._startTime: Vesting start time array as seconds since unix epoch
params._upFront: array of Amount of tokens `_recipient[i]` will get  right away
params._vestingPeriodInDays: Array of Number of days in each Period

calculateVestingClaim(address).details: Calculate the vested and unclaimed period and tokens available for `_recepient` to claim Due to rounding errors once grant duration is reached, returns the entire left grant amount

claimVestedTokens().details: Allows a vesting recipient to claim their vested tokens. Errors if no tokens have vested It is advised recipients check they are entitled to claim via `calculateVestingClaim` before calling this
